title: Like a Dolphin!
detail_text: <:th_ch0209/>That was awesome......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Ahaha, you really enjoyed yourself, didn’t you?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Yes, I had a lot of fun. Rina-chan Board says, “All smiles.”<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Which exhibits did you like the most?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>I can’t rank them all, but the dolphin show was the best.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Oh, the dolphin show. They were amazing!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Yeah. And watching the dolphin show made me want to hold a live concert.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Huh?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>It looked fun to jump in sync with the music. Their performance gave joy to everyone in the audience. It seemed just like a live concert......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Ahaha! Now that you mention it, you’re right! Then, how about we go watch it again? Maybe you’ll be able to come up with more live concert ideas! Let’s go~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
